
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.math.BigInteger;
import java.util.Scanner;

class CODE {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
		Scanner sc= new Scanner(System.in);
		int t=sc.nextInt();
		while(t-->0){
			int n=sc.nextInt();
			long arr[]= new long[n];
			
			
			for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
				arr[i]=sc.nextLong();
			}
			long gcd=arr[0];
			for (int i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) {
				gcd=gcdA(gcd,arr[i]);
				
			}
			System.out.println(gcd);
		}
		 
		}

	private static long gcdA(long gcd, long i) {
		if(gcd%i==0){
			return i;
		}
		if(i%gcd==0)return gcd;
		if(gcd>i){
			return gcdA(gcd%i, i);
		}
		else return gcdA(gcd,i%gcd);
		
	}
}
